text: allahane akasagala mattu bhumiya prakasa. Adara udaharane higide; gode gudinalli ondu dipavide. Dipavu gajinolagide. Gaju minuguva naksatradantide. Purvaddagali pascimaddagali allada samrd'dha jhaitun maradinda (adara enne.Yinda) adannu belagalagide. Adu benki taguladiddaru uridu belaguvantide, prakasada mele matte prakasa. Allahane tanicchisidavarannu tanna prakasadedege nadesuttane. Hige allahanu manavarigagi udaharanegalannu mundiduttane. Allahanantu ellavannu ballavanagiddane
